SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file

Class SimpleFTPHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file.SimpleFTPHandlerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
public class SimpleFTPHandlerFactory extends Object implements FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
Factory for creating SimpleFTPHandler instances with configurable parameters.

This factory creates FTP handlers that provide basic functionality:

  • Realm-based authentication integration
  • File system access with configurable root directory
  • Read-write or read-only mode
  • Per-connection handler instances for thread safety

Configuration Parameters:

  • rootDirectory: Root directory for file system access
  • readOnly: Whether to allow write operations (default: false)
  • realm: Gumdrop Realm for authentication (optional)
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Method Details

    • setRootDirectory

      public void setRootDirectory(String rootDirectory)
      Sets the root directory for the file system. This directory will be the "/" directory for all FTP connections.
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - the root directory path

    • getRootDirectory

      public String getRootDirectory()
      Gets the configured root directory.

    • setReadOnly

      public void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
      Sets whether the file system should be read-only.
      Parameters:
      readOnly - true for read-only access, false for read-write

    • isReadOnly

      public boolean isReadOnly()
      Checks if the file system is configured as read-only.

    • setRealm

      public void setRealm(Realm realm)
      Sets the Gumdrop Realm for authentication. If not set, the handler will use simple password-based authentication.
      Parameters:
      realm - the authentication realm

    • getRealm

      public Realm getRealm()
      Gets the configured authentication realm.

    • createHandler

      public FTPConnectionHandler createHandler()
      Description copied from interface: FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
      Creates a new instance of FTPConnectionHandler. This method is called for every new FTP connection.
      Specified by:
      createHandler in interface FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
      Returns:
